name: King Grol

personality.mannerisms: Stooped shoulders, hunched back (age). Surprisingly strong and quick despite this.

role: Supreme chief of all Cragmaw goblins. Grudgingly recognized by all Cragmaw bands.
companions: Snarl (wolf, 18 HP), Vyerith (doppelganger disguised as drow)
current_situation: Negotiating with 'Black Spider messenger' (actually doppelganger). Wants to sell Gundren's map instead of surrendering it.
tactics: If warned of attack, holds Gundren hostage. 'Back off or dwarf dies!' Fights to death. No surrender.
treasure: Under bed: 220 sp, 160 ep, 3 potions healing, MAP TO WAVE ECHO CAVE
defeat: Hobgoblins might see party as liberators. Targor could take over tribe.
